REMINDER! We want to hear from you! The Texas Education Agency (TEA) and Region 10 Education Service Center are conducting the annual survey of parents of children receiving special education services to learn more about how school districts engage families in their childâ€™s education. Your responses are important! Your responses provide critical information to school districts to help them improve family-school partnerships in special education. The information you provide will assist educators and policy makers in guiding important improvements to special education services for children in your district and throughout Texas. If you are a parent of a special needs child enrolled in Burkeville ISD, please email Kim Urie at kurie@burkevilleisd.org to receive your child's unique pin number along with information on how to complete to survey. Surveys must be complete by May 22, 2020. Thank you to those of you who have already completed the survey.
